ovdesc.p: This file contains one record for each company and holds date information for use within the Management Information module. The following infromation is held on this file;
Whether updates are permitted to the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file, and the period for which these records should be kept.
The closing of months is controlled in this file.
The most important aspect of this file is its use in controlling the various MI processes, and holds the dates on which the following processes were last run ;
Balance movement population. Balance movement calculation. Profit and loss allocation.

desc.p: This field is used to determine if updates to the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file are required.
Input must either be Y or NO.
System field indicating the last date on which the generation of MI.COF.ENTRIES (for the above COF Type) for Contract records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file was run.
This field holds the date up to which the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file has been populated with movement information.
The year and month held in this field is the year and month for which closing information is held for in the next (related) field ACT.CLOSE.DATE.
The fields YEAR.MONTH and ACT.CLOSE.DATE form a related multi value set.
Standard T24 YearMonth field (6 Numeric characters).
System field indicating the last date on which the generation of cost of funds entries for CONTRACT records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file was run.
This is the key to the records which are held on this file.
Each record key must be a valid company, and the only record which may be accessed is the recording pertaining to the current company.
Must be the current company code.

This field indicates the number of months for which information on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file will be retained. After information is older than the number of months defined here it will be removed on a monthly basis by the EOD process PURGE.BAL.MVMT.
Two numeric characters. Must be greater than 12.

The default day on which the end of a month (excpet year end) is to be closed for Management Information purposes is held in this field. If no other date is entered into the ACT.CLOSE.DATE field then this day will be used.

The default day on which the end of year is to be closed for Management Information purposes is held in this field. If no other date is entered into the ACT.CLOSE.DATE field then this day will be used.
System field indicating the last date on which the P & L allocation process was run.
System field indicating the last date on which the generation of cost of funds entries for ACCOUNT records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file was run.
The date on which the year month held in the above related field - YEAR.MONTH - has closed for Management Information purposes.
Can not be earlier than today.
Must a date later than the end of the year month specfied in the related YEAR.MONTH field.
Specifies the ID of an Additional Cost Of Funds Type.
This field holds the date up to which the BALANCE.MOVEMENT calculation job was run up to on the last time it was run.
System field indicating the last date on which the generation of MI.COF.ENTRIES (for the above COF Type) for Account records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file was run.
